abstract: A new novel has the protagonist’s wife give birth to a 1971 VW Beetle, positioning the book in a long and not inglorious tradition of casting the Bug as a repository for existential feeling.
snippet: A new novel has the protagonist’s wife give birth to a 1971 VW Beetle, positioning the book in a long and not inglorious tradition of casting the Bug as a repository for existential feeling.

headline.main: In American Literature, the Volkswagen Beetle as Muse and Mutant
